content: **baby overalls top-down ** these baby overalls are very stretchy thanks to the all-over ribbing the rib stitch may take a bit longer to knit but it gives the fabric comfort flexibility and room to grow worked from the top down the design allows you to easily add length to the legs as your baby grows **size** fits most babies from 6 12 months approx eu size 80 **materials** yarn kartopu ak-soft or any comparable dk yarn suitable for 5 mm us 8 needles 2 skeins approx 350 yards / 320 meters note choose a yarn that is typically knit on 5 mm us 8 needles even though this pattern uses 4 mm us 6 needles this ensures a dense enough fabric even when stretched needles 4 mm us 6 circular needles or size needed to match gauge optional 4 mm us 6 dpns for working legs three stitch holders or scrap yarn two buttons diameter 2 cm tapestry needle stitch markers
